Anja Šurina

Student Researcher @GoogleDeepmind, PhD student @EPFL

Hi! My name is Anja. I am a PhD student in AI at EPFL advised by Prof. Cağlar Gülçehre and a Student Researcher at Google Deepmind. My research interests lie in scientific discovery with AI & LLM cognition.

I was previously an intern at Prof. Yoshua Bengio’s lab at Mila, a visiting student researcher at Prof. Jure Leskovec’s Lab at Stanford, and an intern at IBM Research in Zurich. I received my master’s degree in Neural Systems and Computation from ETH Zurich and my bachelor’s degree from the University of Ljubljana.
